# Summary

When [rent-controlled](../aggregators/rent-control.qmd) rents create excess demand, informal payments may emerge as a rationing device. One example is "key money", a nonrefundable deposit paid upon moving in that was documented in Cairo's rent-controlled housing market [@Malpezzi1998].
